attributes.action: Set up local Addiction Awareness Programs in Every School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I urge the PM to set up Addictions Awareness Program in every school for students from age of 10 upward on alcohol, drugs, smoking, food and gambling.   By educating the student how the brain becomes addicted to substances or chemical, we can then encourage youngsters to better prepare their lives to deal with the temptation of addiction and making healthier lifestyle choices for good and all!
